description: Guidelines and rules for icon usage in VibeX. Ensures consistency, performance, and alignment with the design system.
rules: Icons must be imported individually from react-icons to reduce bundle size.
Do not inline raw SVGs unless they are registered inside the Design System.
Icons must follow brand color tokens (primary, neutral, semantic).
Use consistent sizing: small (16px), medium (20px), large (24px), extra-large (32px).
Icons used for actions must always have accessible labels (aria-label or title).
Icons should never replace text for critical actions, they must be paired with labels.
Maintain visual consistency: avoid mixing styles from different sets in the same component unless justified.
guidelines: Lucide: Use for lightweight UI actions and dashboards.
Heroicons: Default choice for app navigation and core components.
Font Awesome: Use as fallback for broader icon coverage.
